title.@value: Single episode depressive disorder, currently in partial remission

definition.@value: Single episode depressive disorder, currently in partial remission, is diagnosed when the full definitional requirements for a depressive episode have been met and there is no history of prior depressive episodes. The full definitional requirements for a depressive episode are no longer met but some significant mood symptoms remain.

label.@value: Single episode depressive disorder, currently in partial remission
